text: I always wanted to be a hero something
that I felt like I was born for I always
wanted to be there out there no matter
what was going on no matter what was
happening just to be on the front lines
helping people that nobody would help I
remember my mother looks at me one day
and she said you don't even have to
worry about school because you're gonna
be a hero and she was right she was
it's just you know my grandfather served
in World War two and now I said that's
just what we do as a family we're heroes
and Alan are we better than you
